title: The Gold Master - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Celebrities   Contracts   Handsome Male Lead   Outdoor Interc**rse   Possessive Characters   Power Couple   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Wealthy Characters
author: Lu Shi An   鹿時安
description:
Huo Chengyan raised a little lover. The young masters in the city thought that Huo Chengyan was just playing around. Why would he be serious with a plaything?

At first, Huo Chengyan indeed thought that he was just playing around. Later on, he realized that he doesn't want to let her go.>
